name: ASCII Art Font Browser
short_description:
FIGlet and TOIlet Font Browser
==============================

From the files above, download the main scritpt *asciiart-font-browser*. It is a standalone bash script which calls figlet or toilet.

Please make sure you have figlet or toilet installed first.

    $ sudo apt-get install figlet toilet

The *figlet-font-browser* and *toilet-font-browser* are just wrappers - download main script in order to use them.

Example usage
-------------
    ./asciiart-font-browser --help
    ./asciiart-font-browser this is a text --toilet --less
    ./toilet-font-browser --less

summary: Font Browser for FIGlet and TOIlet
